Text: Update email addresseveryone Hope you had a wonderful holiday We sure did The dogs loved playing in snow for the first time in Colorado Chris and I returned unscathed If you havent already please update my email address to my work email mailto I dont check my Hotmail account very often anymore Kyle does Dana have a new email address Talk with you soon Pam Macaul Information Developer office A bmclogogif compgif

RE Monthly Girls Night Dinner Cc Sounds good Original Message From Dana R Richardson mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Hadix Susan Cc Jennifer Lamprecht Email Pam Macaul Email Tori Kuykendall Email Subject Re Monthly Girls Night Dinner That date sounds good to me Dana Richardson CMS Oil and Gas Company Hadix Susan Susan To Dana Richardson Email lpasocom Jennifer Lamprecht Email Pam Macaul Email Tori Kuykendall Email AM cc Fax to Subject Monthly Girls Night Dinner Jennifer mentioned we should all do dinner together once a month I think its a great idea and would like to commit to the next date How about you I was looking at Wednesday November th This is definitely open to suggestions Thanks Susan A Hadix Senior Volume Analyst Tennessee Gas Pipeline Co phone pager fax after hours This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Baby Shower for Tripp Cc Hello Ladies Ive talked to all of you and you all have expressed interest in cohostessing if that is a word Tripps baby shower I just wanted to send out an initial email to let you know where we are and a date After perusing a calender and talking with Tripp the planned date is Saturday November th I know the time between Thanksgiving and New Years is crazy for everyone and right after New Years is cutting it close since Tripp is due Jan th plus or minus weeks It will be a brunch ish Tripp will send me an invitation list around October st At this point Tripp is undecided on whether it will be just a girls shower or a couples shower Tripp is thinking that it may be about people max The default venue will be my place however Susan has offered to use her place which I may need to take her up on because our living room is really only good for people max Susan are you still okay with that As we get closer I will send out a list of things we need to do and let you pick what you want to do Or let me know before then if there is anything you are dying to do See you soon Pam Macaul Information Developer A
